quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares that it is his duty.
The problem with educating stupid people was that they didn't know they were stupid. The same went for curing crazy people.
Stupid people will mistake your confidence for arrogance.
The problem with the world is that everyone does not have a brain, but everyone does have a tongue.
Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish.
A brainiac notices everything, an ignoramus comments about everything.
Never argue with stupid people, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience.
Genius may have its limitations, but stupidity is not thus handicapped.
Get all the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
He is not only dull himself, but the cause of dulness in others.
The biggest cause of trouble in the world today is that the stupid people are so sure about things and the intelligent folks are so full of doubts.
Stupid people always think they are right. Wise people listen to advice.
Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak and to remove all doubt.
Showing off is the fool's idea of glory.
The real war is not between the West and the East. The real war is between intelligent and stupid people.
If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.
Stupid people do make me lose my temper and most people are stupid, fortunately for me. It's made it easier for me to make a living.
Most people would sooner die than start to think. In fact - they do so.
Unintelligent people always look for a scapegoat.
It costs to be stupid. The stupider you are, the more it costs.
An empty head is not really empty; it is stuffed with rubbish. Hence the difficulty of forcing anything into an empty head.
I just hate stupid people. They should have to wear signs that say 'I'm Stupid.' That way you wouldn't rely on them, and you wouldn't ask them for nothing.
Although it is not true that all conservatives are stupid people, it is true that most stupid people are conservative.
If there are no stupid questions, then what kind of questions do stupid people ask? Do they get smart just in time to ask questions?
Only stupid people don't change their minds.
Wise men create proverbs and fools repeat them.
